'''Samuel Hazeldine''', also known as '''Sam Hazeldine''', is an English actor. He will portray [[Adar (The Rings of Power)|Adar]] in the second season of the ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power|The Rings of Power]]'' series by [[Amazon Studios|Amazon]], taking over this role from [[Joseph Mawle]].<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7631058/fullcredits?ref_=tt_cl_sm|articlename=''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'': Full Cast & Crew|website=IMDb|accessed=19 September 2022}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.yahoo.com/entertainment/rings-power-recasts-orc-villain-154059274.html|articlename=‘Rings of Power’ Recasts Orc Villain Role Adar for Season 2 as Additional New Cast Members Revealed|website=Yahoo|accessed=1 December 2022}}</ref>
